subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Mark Brunell is a 17-year N.F.L. veteran who was the holder for Garrett Hartley on Hartley’s 40-yard field goal in overtime that vaulted New Orleans into the Super Bowl.
snippet: Mark Brunell is a 17-year N.F.L. veteran who was the holder for Garrett Hartley on Hartley’s 40-yard field goal in overtime that vaulted New Orleans into the Super Bowl.
